StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPermissionsForPost]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @intPostID int ) AS
SELECT rp.PermissionId, rp.RequiresContext FROM Post p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleID Where p.Id = @intPostID UNION SELECT PermissionId, '0' FROM PostPermission WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PostID = @intPostID
